- [ ] Compile the Project

	- Frontend: npm install

- [ ] Create and Run Task

	- Frontend: npm start (runs on port 3000)

- [ ] Launch the Project
	- Start Flask backend first
	- Start React frontend second
	- Frontend proxy configured to connect to backend
